main.title: Coding everywhere
main.body:
Hello, I'm Felipe Gibran.
This is my space that I share to everyone. Be my guest.

about_me.title: Who I am
about_me.body: I'm fullstack web software engineer with 5+ years of experience. I've been working with several technologies that ensured me the ability to solve problems and develop many types of application. My responsibility is to show the best solution for clients. As a result, they will have a top quality application with low operating and maintenance costs.

feature.title: What I can bring for your application

feat1.name: technology
feat1.title: Ultimate Technology Tools
feat1.description: Your application will be up to date with the best technologies and services of present day.

feat2.name: code
feat2.title: Clean & Structured code
feat2.description: Good codes are better for maintenance and third-parties implementations.

feat3.name: automation
feat3.title: Automation and Customization
feat3.description: The sky is the limit. Determine how automatic and customizable your application is, based on your budget.

feat4.name: security
feat4.title: Security
feat4.description: Safety above all. All security standards will be applied for your application.

feat5.name: responsiveness
feat5.title: Responsiveness
feat5.description: 80% of users prefer to browse web on smartphones rather than computers.

feat6.name: ux
feat6.title: Highest User Experience (UX)
feat6.description: The best experience that users can ever have. Engaged users means low rejection rate.

feat7.name: fastness
feat7.title: Fastness
feat7.description: Time is money. Good performance is also important to keep users.

feat8.name: seo
feat8.title: SEO patterns
feat8.description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) makes your application easier to get new users.

item2.name: wow
item2.title: WOW Talent
item2.description:
Where talents grow and appear. Press Play and meet wow Ambassadors. WOW, even though they are young, each one of them has been treading their own path of professional success, with experiences and achievements that are a reference for the Talents who are starting the same journey. Meet all our ambassadors. Be part of it!

I worked as: Fullstack Developer

Year: 2021

item6.name: illsim
item6.title: Illness Simulator
item6.description:
Welcome to Illsim! This is a college project developed in 2017 that studies the behavior of a virus spreading around a population. This study is to explore the best vaccination strategies as the virus spreads.

I worked as: Frontend Developer
